entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
